mapper.select: SELECT * FROM LECTURE L INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(L.DEPTNUM=D.DEPTNUM) WHERE LECTURENUM=#{lectureNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE (USERNAME,LECTURENAME,SEMESTER,CATEGORY,DEPTNUM,GRADE, YEAR,WEEKDAY, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, PERSONAL, COMPLETIONGRADE,TEMPORARY) VALUES (#{username},#{lectureName},#{semester},#{category},#{deptNum},#{grade},#{year},#{weekday}, #{startTime},#{endTime},#{personal},#{completionGrade},1)

INSERT INTO LECTURE (USERNAME,LECTURENAME,SEMESTER,CATEGORY,DEPTNUM,GRADE, YEAR,WEEKDAY, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, PERSONAL, COMPLETIONGRADE,TEMPORARY) VALUES (#{username},#{lectureName},#{semester},#{category},#{deptNum},#{grade},#{year},#{weekday}, #{startTime},#{endTime},#{personal},#{completionGrade},0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `MEMBER` M INNER JOIN PROFESSOR P ON (M.USERNAME=P.USERNAME) INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (P.USERNAME=L.USERNAME) WHERE LECTURENUM=#{lectureNum}
SELECT COUNT(S.SYLLABUSNUM) FROM SYLLABUS S WHERE LECTURENUM=#{lectureNum}
SELECT C.* FROM SYLLABUS S INNER JOIN CLASS C ON(S.SYLLABUSNUM=C.SYLLABUSNUM) INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON(S.LECTURENUM=L.LECTURENUM) WHERE LECTURENAME=#{lectureName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYLLABUS (LECTURENUM, CURRICULUMOUTLINE, GOAL, EVALUATION, METHOD, BOOKNAME, BOOKAUTHOR, BOOKPUBLISHER, BOOKPUBLICATIONDATE, BOOKISBN, BOOKNOTE) VALUES (#{lectureNum},#{curriculumOutline}, #{goal},#{evaluation},#{method},#{bookName},#{bookAuthor},#{bookPublisher},#{bookPublicationDate}, #{bookISBN},#{bookNote})
mapper.update: UPDATE CLASS SET SUBJECT=#{subject},GOAL=#{goal},CAPABILITY=#{capability},NOTE=#{note} WHERE `ORDER`=#{order} AND SYLLABUSNUM=#{syllabusNum}
